parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.76</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Remove a weapon from a unit. An attempt to remove a weapon, which is not in unit's possession, is simply ignored. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''removeWeaponGlobal''' weapon </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]] - weapon class name </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{
	_x [[removeWeaponGlobal]] "Laserdesignator";
} [[forEach]] [[allUnits]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>{
	[[if]] ([[typeOf]] _x == "O_Heli_Attack_02_black_F") [[then]] {
		_x [[removeWeaponGlobal]] "rockets_Skyfire";
	};
} [[forEach]] [[vehicles]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[addWeaponGlobal]], [[removeWeapon]], [[removeMagazine]], [[removeMagazineGlobal]], [[removeAllWeapons]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
